properties.entry: INSERT INTO SSO_LOGIN_LOG ( ID , TICKET_ID , PRINCIPAL_ID , AUTH_TYPE , IS_DESKTOP_LOGIN , RETURN_URL , CLIENT_ID , HOST_NAME , USER_AGENT_ADDR,LOGIN_TIME ) VALUES ( #id# , #ticketId# , #principalId# , #authType# , #isDesktopLogin# , #returnUrl# , #clientId# , #hostName# , #userAgentAddr#,#loginTime# )
INSERT INTO SSO_LOGOUT_LOG ( ID , TICKET_ID , RETURN_URL , HOST_NAME , USER_AGENT_ADDR, LOGOUT_TIME ) VALUES (#id# , #ticketId# , #returnUrl# , #hostName# , #userAgentAddr#, #logoutTime#)
